WorkItem.Description: Setting a RibbonButton's Visibility = "Collapsed" threw a Dispatcher exception regarding a re-entrancy bug during application start-up. It works fine when Visibility="Hidden". We have complex forms, but you should be able to reproduce by creating a RibbonWindow and adding a RibbonButton to the RibbonQuickAccessToolbar with Visibility="Collapsed" and running the project.
